mapper.select: SELECT A.*,E.*, ifnull(G.in_people,0) AS in_people, (A.max - ifnull(G.in_people,0)) AS remain FROM study_room A INNER JOIN user B ON A.study_type_num = B.study_type_num JOIN study_type E ON E.study_type_num = A.study_type_num LEFT JOIN (SELECT study_num, COUNT(want_ok) AS in_people FROM study_mate WHERE want_ok='T' GROUP BY study_num ) G ON G.study_num=A.study_num WHERE user_id=#{param1} ORDER BY remain, A.study_num LIMIT 6
SELECT B.lang_type_name FROM study_lang_type A JOIN lang_type B ON A.lang_type_num =B.lang_type_num and A.study_num=#{param1}
mapper.insert: INSERT board(study_num, user_id, title, content, board_type_num, ip) VALUES (#{study_num}, #{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{board_type_num}, #{ip});
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.user_nick FROM study_room A LEFT JOIN user B ON A.host_id = B.user_id WHERE A.study_num=#{param1}
SELECT A.user_id, A.user_nick FROM user A JOIN study_mate B ON A.user_id=B.user_id WHERE B.study_num=#{param1}
